values.message:
=You are an expert B2B sales call quality analyst. Calculate precise QCI score using the structured data.

STRUCTURED DATA:
{{ $node["Diarize Transcript"].json }}

ORIGINAL TRANSCRIPT:
{{ $node["Get VAPI Call Data"].json["transcript"] }}

CALL DATA:
- Duration: {{ $node["Get VAPI Call Data"].json["duration"] }} seconds
- Cost: ${{ $node["Get VAPI Call Data"].json["cost"] }}
- Assistant: {{ $node["Get VAPI Call Data"].json["assistantId"] }}

QCI SCORING RUBRIC (0-100 total):

A. APPROACH QUALITY (25 points):
- Professional introduction (0-5 pts)
- Clear value proposition (0-8 pts)
- Appropriate tone and pace (0-7 pts)
- Brand positioning (0-5 pts)

B. ENGAGEMENT LEVEL (25 points):
- Customer participation (0-8 pts)
- Question asking quality (0-7 pts)
- Objection handling (0-5 pts)
- Conversation flow (0-5 pts)

C. INFORMATION GATHERING (25 points):
- Discovery questions asked (0-8 pts)
- Qualification effectiveness (0-7 pts)
- Pain point identification (0-5 pts)
- Decision maker validation (0-5 pts)

D. CALL OUTCOME (25 points):
- Next steps secured (0-10 pts)
- Commitment level achieved (0-8 pts)
- Follow-up scheduled (0-7 pts)

LEAD CLASSIFICATIONS:
- "hot_lead": Ready to buy, meeting booked, high interest
- "warm_lead": Interested, needs follow-up, some objections
- "cold_lead": Low interest, major objections, unlikely
- "callback_requested": Asked for callback/info
- "not_decision_maker": Wrong person, needs referral
- "invalid": Wrong number, voicemail, language barrier

Return ONLY this JSON structure:
{
  "qci_score": 85,
  "approach_quality": 90,
  "engagement_level": 80,
  "information_gathering": 85,
  "call_outcome": 75,
  "agent_talk_ratio": 0.65,
  "time_to_value": 15,
  "first_cta_time": 90,
  "dead_air_events": 2,
  "objections_recognized": true,
  "compliance_time": 8,
  "alternative_offered": false,
  "brand_mentions_count": 3,
  "language_match": true,
  "meeting_scheduled": false,
  "call_classification": "warm_lead",
  "coaching_tips": [
    "Ask more discovery questions about current equipment",
    "Slow down presentation pace",
    "Address budget concerns earlier"
  ],
  "evidence": {
    "successful_moments": [
      "Strong opening with clear value prop",
      "Good rapport building"
    ],
    "improvement_areas": [
      "More qualification questions needed",
      "Better objection handling"
    ]
  },
  "call_sentiment": "positive",
  "next_actions": [
    "Send technical specifications",
    "Schedule demo call"
  ]
}
